mapper.sql: id as id, po_code as poCode, ext_code as extCode, ext_po_code as extPoCode, original_ext_odo_code as originalExtOdoCode, original_ec_order_code as originalEcOrderCode, customer_id as customerId, store_id as storeId, supplier_id as supplierId, from_location as fromLocation, to_location as toLocation, logistics_provider as logisticsProvider, po_type as poType, ext_po_type as extPoType, status as status, is_iqc as isIqc, date_format(po_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as poDateStr, date_format(eta,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as etaStr, po_date as poDate, eta as eta, delivery_time as deliveryTime, qty_planned as qtyPlanned, qty_rcvd as qtyRcvd, ctn_planned as ctnPlanned, ctn_rcvd as ctnRcvd, start_time as startTime, date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTimeStr, stop_time as stopTime, date_format(stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as stopTimeStr, inbound_time as inboundTime, date_format(inbound_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as inboundTimeStr, is_wms as isWms, is_vmi as isVmi, data_source as dataSource, create_time as createTime, created_id as createdId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId, is_auto_close as isAutoClose, ou_id as ouId

bipo.id as id, bipo.ou_id as ouId, bipo.po_code as poCode, bipo.ext_code as extCode, bipo.customer_id as customerId, bipo.store_id as storeId, bipo.supplier_id as supplierId, bipo.logistics_provider as logisticsProvider, bipo.po_type as poType, bipo.status as status, bipo.is_iqc as isIqc, date_format(bipo.po_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as poDateStr, date_format(bipo.eta,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as etaStr, bipo.po_date as poDate, bipo.eta as eta, bipo.delivery_time as deliveryTime, bipo.qty_planned as qtyPlanned, bipo.qty_rcvd as qtyRcvd, bipo.ctn_planned as ctnPlanned, bipo.ctn_rcvd as ctnRcvd, bipo.start_time as startTime, date_format(bipo.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTimeStr, bipo.stop_time as stopTime, date_format(bipo.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as stopTimeStr, bipo.inbound_time as inboundTime, date_format(bipo.inbound_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as inboundTimeStr, bipo.is_wms as isWms, bipo.is_vmi as isVmi, bipo.create_time as createTime, bipo.created_id as createdId, bipo.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, bipo.modified_id as modifiedId, bipo.is_auto_close as isAutoClose, customer.customer_name as customerName, store.store_name as storeName, supplier.name as supplierName, potypedic.dic_label as poTypeName, postatusdic.dic_label as statusName

bipo.id as id, bipo.ou_id as ouId, bipo.po_code as poCode, bipo.ext_code as extCode, bipo.customer_id as customerId, bipo.store_id as storeId, bipo.supplier_id as supplierId, bipo.logistics_provider as logisticsProvider, bipo.po_type as poType, bipo.status as status, bipo.is_iqc as isIqc, date_format(bipo.po_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as poDateStr, date_format(bipo.eta,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as etaStr, bipo.po_date as poDate, bipo.eta as eta, bipo.delivery_time as deliveryTime, bipo.qty_planned as qtyPlanned, bipo.qty_rcvd as qtyRcvd, bipo.ctn_planned as ctnPlanned, bipo.ctn_rcvd as ctnRcvd, bipo.start_time as startTime, date_format(bipo.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTimeStr, bipo.stop_time as stopTime, date_format(bipo.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as stopTimeStr, bipo.inbound_time as inboundTime, date_format(bipo.inbound_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as inboundTimeStr, bipo.is_wms as isWms, bipo.is_vmi as isVmi, bipo.create_time as createTime, bipo.created_id as createdId, bipo.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, bipo.modified_id as modifiedId, bipo.is_auto_close as isAutoClose, supplier.name as supplierName
mapper.select:
select
from t_bi_po bipo left join t_bi_customer customer on customer.ID=bipo.customer_id left join t_bi_store store on store.id=bipo.store_id left join t_wh_supplier supplier on supplier.id=bipo.supplier_id left join sys_dictionary potypedic on potypedic.group_value='PO_TYPE' and potypedic.dic_value=bipo.po_type left join sys_dictionary postatusdic on postatusdic.group_value = 'BIPO_STATUS' and postatusdic.dic_value = bipo.status where bipo.po_code = #{code}

select
from t_bi_po bipo left join t_bi_customer customer on customer.ID=bipo.customer_id left join t_bi_store store on store.id=bipo.store_id left join t_wh_supplier supplier on supplier.id=bipo.supplier_id left join sys_dictionary potypedic on potypedic.group_value='PO_TYPE' and potypedic.dic_value=bipo.po_type left join sys_dictionary postatusdic on postatusdic.group_value = 'BIPO_STATUS' and postatusdic.dic_value = bipo.status where bipo.id = #{id}
select from t_bi_po bipo left join t_wh_supplier supplier on supplier.id=bipo.supplier_id
select count(*) from t_bi_po bipo left join t_wh_supplier supplier on supplier.id=bipo.supplier_id
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_bi_po SET po_code = #{poCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_code = #{extCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_po_code = #{extPoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , original_ext_odo_code = #{originalExtOdoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , original_ec_order_code = #{originalEcOrderCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , customer_id = #{customerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , store_id = #{storeId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , supplier_id = #{supplierId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , from_location = #{fromLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , to_location = #{toLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , logistics_provider = #{logisticsProvider,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=BIGINT} , po_type = #{poType,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ext_po_type = #{extPoType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , status = #{status,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_iqc = #{isIqc,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , po_date = #{poDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , eta = #{eta,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , qty_planned = #{qtyPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , qty_rcvd = #{qtyRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , ctn_planned = #{ctnPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ctn_rcvd = #{ctnRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , start_time = #{startTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , stop_time = #{stopTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , inbound_time = #{inboundTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , is_wms = #{isWms,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , is_vmi = #{isVmi,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , data_source = #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , last_modify_time = now() , is_auto_close = #{isAutoClose,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}
id = #{id} and last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime}
mapper.select:
select
from t_bi_po where ext_code = #{extCode} and store_id=#{storeId}
